00028 namespace egui { namespace types {
00029 /*
00030     Wrappers over some Win32 raw structures
00031 */
00032 
00033 struct rectangle ;
00034 typedef int line_int_type;
00035 
00036 
00038 enum {
00039     inflate_to_right = 1, inflate_to_left = 2,
00040     inflate_to_top = 4, inflate_to_bottom = 8
00041 };
00042 
00043 
00047 struct size {
00048     line_int_type width, height;
00049 
00050     size(line_int_type width = 0, line_int_type height = 0) : width(width), height(height) {
00051     }
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00058 struct point {
00059     line_int_type x, y;
00060     point(line_int_type x = 0, line_int_type y = 0) : x(x), y(y) {
00061     }
00062 
00063     point convert(const wnd<> & from, const wnd<> & to) const;
00064     bool is_in_rect(const rectangle & r) const;
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 
00072 struct rectangle {
00073     point start;
00074     typedef size size_type;
00075     size_type size;
00076 
00077     rectangle(point start = point(), size_type sz = size_type() ) : start(start), size(sz) {}
00078     rectangle(line_int_type x, line_int_type y, line_int_type width, line_int_type height) : start(x,y), size(width,height) {}
00079 
00080 
00081     line_int_type height() const { return size.height; }
00082     line_int_type width() const { return size.width; }
00083 
00084     point top_left() const { return start; }
00085     point bottom_right() const { return point(start.x + size.width, start.y + size.height); }
00086 
00091     rectangle to_point(const point& p) const { 
00092         return rectangle(p.x, p.y, p.x - start.x , p.y - start.y); 
00093     }
00094 
00095     rectangle convert(const wnd<> & from, const wnd<> & to) const;
00096     bool contains_point(const point & p) const; 
00097 
00098     rectangle intersect(const rectangle& other) const; 
00099     rectangle merge(const rectangle& other) const;
00100     rectangle inflate(const size_type&, int direction = inflate_to_right | inflate_to_bottom) const;
00101 
00102         // steven: added
00103         void offset(int x, int y);
00104     void offset(const size_type & sz) { offset(sz.width, sz.height); }
00105         
00107         void deflate(const size_type& size)     { inflate(size, inflate_to_left | inflate_to_top); }    
00108 };
00109 
00115 const rectangle invalid_rect = rectangle(0,0,-1,-1);

00126 struct color {
00127     color(int r = 0, int g = 0, int b = 0);
00128 
00129     const int red() const       ;
00130     const int green() const     ;
00131     const int blue() const      ;
00132 
00133     color & red(int val) ;
00134     color & green(int val);
00135     color & blue(int val) ;
00136 
00137     static color invalid_ ;
00138     bool equal(const color & other) const { return m_rgb == other.m_rgb; }
00139 private:
00140     static color invalid_color() ;
00141 
00142 private:
00143     unsigned long m_rgb;
00144 };
00145 
00146 inline bool operator==(const color & a, const color & b) {
00147     return a.equal(b);
00148 }
00149 inline bool operator!=(const color & a, const color & b) {
00150     return !( a == b);
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 
00155 inline bool operator==(const point & a, const point & b) {
00156     return a.x == b.x && a.y == b.y;
00157 }
00158 inline bool operator!=(const point & a, const point & b) {
00159     return !( a == b);
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 inline bool operator==(const size & a, const size & b) {
00164     return a.width == b.width && a.height == b.height;
00165 }
00166 inline bool operator!=(const size & a, const size & b) {
00167     return !( a == b);
00168 }
00169 
00170 inline size &operator+=(size & dest, const size & sz) {
00171     dest.width += sz.width;
00172     dest.height += sz.height;
00173     return dest;
00174 }
00175 
00176 
00177 
00178 inline point &operator+=(point & p, const size & sz) {
00179     p.x += sz.width;
00180     p.y += sz.height;
00181     return p;
00182 }
00183 inline point &operator-=(point & p, const size & sz) {
00184     p.x -= sz.width;
00185     p.y -= sz.height;
00186     return p;
00187 }
00188 
00189 inline point operator+(const point & p, const size & sz) {
00190     point result = p;
00191     result += sz;
00192     return result;
00193 }
00194 inline point operator-(const point & p, const size & sz) {
00195     point result = p;
00196     result -= sz;
00197     return result;
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 inline rectangle &operator+=(rectangle & r, const size & sz) {
00202     r.size += sz;
00203     return r;
00204 }
00205 inline rectangle &operator-=(rectangle & r, const size & sz) {
00206     return r += size(-sz.width, -sz.height);
00207 }
00208 
00209 inline rectangle operator+(const rectangle & r, const size & sz) {
00210     rectangle result = r;
00211     result += sz;
00212     return result;
00213 }
00214 inline rectangle operator-(const rectangle & r, const size & sz) {
00215     rectangle result = r;
00216     result -= sz;
00217     return result;
00218 }
00219 
00220 inline bool operator==(const rectangle & a, const rectangle & b) {
00221     return a.start == b.start && a.size == b.size;
00222 }
00223 inline bool operator!=(const rectangle & a, const rectangle & b) {
00224     return !( a == b);
00225 }
